name: Heavy Speed Car
description:
Drive the fastest sports cars of the world at extreme speed and feel the asphalt of the track burning! Drive like a real professional racer to leave your furious rivals behind! Feel the competition and speed boost your car to the finish line!

Features:
Smooth controls.
Different challenges.
Real in-game sounds.
Stunning locations.
Multiple challenges.
Realistic 3D graphics.
Different camera views.
